name: Edgewood Tahoe Golf Course
description: Edgewood Tahoe Golf Course is a must-play destination because of its breathtaking setting along the shores of Lake Tahoe, offering stunning mountain and water views on every hole. As a championship course that hosts the annual American Century Celebrity Golf Tournament, it provides a challenging yet enjoyable experience for golfers of all skill levels. With its pristine fairways, world-class amenities, and a backdrop that seamlessly blends luxury with nature, Edgewood Tahoe delivers an unforgettable round of golf.

faqs.question: What’s included in Edgewood golf group packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, guaranteed tee times at Edgewood, carts, and concierge planning. Add transportation, dining, and multi-course itineraries.

faqs.question: How much do Edgewood packages cost?
faqs.answer: Typical range is $299–$699 per golfer depending on dates, lodging choice, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you handle corporate or tournament groups?
faqs.answer: Yes—room blocks, tee-sheet management, tournament setup, and logistics for executive and corporate events.

meta.title: Edgewood Tahoe Golf Course | Lake Tahoe Golf Groups & Stay and Play
meta.description: Play Edgewood Tahoe with golf groups, tee times, and stay-and-play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and leisure trips.

bodyText: Play Edgewood Tahoe with golf groups, tee times, and stay-and-play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and leisure trips. Rated 4.8/5 (672).

Edgewood Tahoe Golf Course is a must-play destination because of its breathtaking setting along the shores of Lake Tahoe, offering stunning mountain and water views on every hole. As a championship course that hosts the annual American Century Celebrity Golf Tournament, it provides a challenging yet enjoyable experience for golfers of all skill levels. With its pristine fairways, world-class amenities, and a backdrop that seamlessly blends luxury with nature, Edgewood Tahoe delivers an unforgettable round of golf.

Edgewood Tahoe Golf Course – Stateline, NV
Location:
100 Lake Parkway, Stateline, NV 89449
Distance from Key Locations:
5 Minutes – Stateline, NV (Lake Tahoe Casinos)
10 Minutes – South Lake Tahoe, CA
30 Minutes – Carson City, NV
55 Minutes – Downtown Reno
60 Minutes – Peppermill & Atlantis Casino Resorts (Reno)
75 Minutes – Truckee, CA
85 Minutes – Graeagle, CA
90 Minutes – Minden, NV
facilities: Good Practice Facilities – Driving range, chipping area, and putting greens.
Great Golf Shop – Offers premium apparel, equipment, and accessories.
Clubhouse – Features upscale dining, a bar, and panoramic views of Lake Tahoe. Great food too!
Caddie Services – Enhances the golfing experience with expert course knowledge.
Golf Instruction – Private lessons and clinics available from PGA professionals.
On-Course Refreshments – Beverage carts and halfway house for snacks and drinks.
Event & Tournament Hosting – Ideal for corporate outings, charity tournaments, and special events.

tips.title: The Hack!
tips.content: The food in the clubhouse restaurant is very good and the setting couldn’t be better!  Make sure to take a dip into Lake Tahoe following your round.  There really is no better refreshment than that!

tips.title: Golf The High Sierra
tips.content: Book your next group golf trip with us!

pointOfView: It's true! Edgewood Tahoe Golf Course is indeed a memorable golf course. Your entire rounds offers the opportunity to gaze across the expansive waters of Lake Tahoe and awe at the steep mountain peaks of the surrounding Sierra Nevada Mountains. Playing Edgewood is a pricey proposition, but it's a bucket list golf course that needs to be played at least once!
contentParagraphs: Play Edgewood Tahoe with golf groups, tee times, and stay-and-play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and leisure trips. Rated 4.8/5 (672).
This unforgettable gem on the immediate shore of Lake Tahoe is iconic! It not as easy as it might look! Take more club than you think to avoid the front bunker.

For guests staying at the Lodge, you’re able to book your tee times at any point ahead of your arrival. The general public, however, can book only 30 days in advance for your desired day of play. Give us a call and we might be able to book the tee time you’re wanting ahead of the general public.
The food in the clubhouse restaurant is very good and the setting couldn’t be better! Make sure to take a dip into Lake Tahoe following your round. There really is no better refreshment than that!
